sourcesContent:
import {React,useState} from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { ADD_TO_CART, CHANGE_COUNT_CART } from '../../redux/actions/actions'; import PaypaleCheckOutButton from '../PaymentIntegration/PaypaleCheckOutButton'; export default function ProductDetails(props) { const [count, setCount] = useState(1); const item = useSelector(state => state.SelectedProduct.product); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const details = props.details; const Check = () => { if(count<=1) return; else setCount(count-1) }; const HandleAddToCart = () => { const itemSelect = { product : item, qty : count } dispatch(ADD_TO_CART(itemSelect)); dispatch(CHANGE_COUNT_CART()); } return (

{details.category}

{details.title}

{details.description}

Quantity {/* {count} */} {
{count}
}
${details.price} { /* */ }
) }
